column1: use of force, or intimidation or threat of detention or by putting such other
person in fear of death or hurt;
(c)  with  the  consent  of  the  other  person  where  such  consent  has  been
obtained at a time the other person was of unsound mind or was in a state
of intoxication induced by alcohol of drugs.
Explanation: "injuries" includes psychological or mental trauma.
